verses.verse: And <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And when <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, he <S%H3947>took<s%> her, and lay <S%H7901>with<s%> her, and <S%H6031>defiled<s%> her.

And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>cleaved<s%> unto <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>kindly<s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto the <S%H5291>damsel.<s%>

And <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Get<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3207>damsel<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter:<s%> now his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H935>come.<s%>
And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H1696>commune<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> it: and the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H6087>grieved,<s%> and they were very <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in lying <S%H7901>with<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> which <S%H3651>thing<s%> ought <S%H3808>not<s%> to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> <S%H1696>communed<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> <S%H2836>longeth<s%> for your <S%H1323>daughter:<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> her him to <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And make ye <S%H2859>marriages<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto you.

And ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us: and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H3427>dwell<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> ye therein, and get you <S%H270>possessions<s%> therein.

And <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H251>brethren,<s%> Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me I will <S%H5414>give.<s%>

Ask <S%H7235><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me never so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H4119>dowry<s%> and <S%H4976>gift,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: but <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> and <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully,<s%> and <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> their sister: <S%H269><s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, We <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6190>uncircumcised;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> were a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto us:

But <S%H389><s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> will we <S%H225>consent<s%> unto you: <S%H518>If<s%> ye will <S%H1961>be<s%> as we be, that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> of you be <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%>

Then will we <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto you, and we will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us, and we will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you, and we will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, to be <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%> then will we <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and we will be <S%H1980>gone.<s%>
And their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor's<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H309>deferred<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter:<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father.<s%>

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1696>communed<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H8003>peaceable<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us; therefore let them <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> therein; for the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is large <S%H7342>enough<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> them; let us <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us for <S%H802>wives,<s%> and let us <S%H5414>give<s%> them our <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H2063>herein<s%> will the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H225>consent<s%> unto us for to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> if <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among us be <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and their <S%H7075>substance<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> of theirs be ours? <S%H389>only<s%> let us <S%H225>consent<s%> unto them, and they will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us.

And <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3510>sore,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah's<s%> <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H983>boldly,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> out of <S%H7928>Shechem's<s%> <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and their <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and their <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H7704>field,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> took they <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> Ye have <S%H5916>troubled<s%> me to make me to <S%H887>stink<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites:<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> being <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> they shall gather themselves <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H5221>slay<s%> me; and I shall be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Should he deal <S%H6213>with<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> as with an <S%H2181>harlot?<s%>
